segments.text: Do you like being a doctor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , most of the time . But , sometimes things can get difficult .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you tell me about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , sometimes patients can get very unreasonable . They may insist they are sick when they are not .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What can you do when this happens ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not much , usually I'll just keep silent .
segments.speaker: S2
